body:
In Avicus 1.0, the /where (player name) command used to show where certain players were.
This was a donator perk.
However, when I now do /where (player name) when I am on Avicus, it gives me an error message stating that I do not have permission to use the command.

My question is if the command was taken out in the Avicore update, or if it is simply a bug.

Thank you.
body_tagged:

title: /Where Command Question.

replies.body: taken out, should be added back imo
replies.body_tagged: taken out, should be added back imo

replies.body: It was originally staff only. I don't know how it got to be a donor perk, but now it's staff only again.
replies.body_tagged: It was originally staff only. I don't know how it got to be a donor perk, but now it's staff only again.

replies.body: Yeah, I liked it as well so I know If my friends are online or not.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I liked it as well so I know If my friends are online or not.

replies.body: You can look at their profiles. It tells you the exact server and game number they are on now.
replies.body_tagged: You can look at their profiles. It tells you the exact server and game number they are on now.

reply_to.body: Yeah, I liked it as well so I know If my friends are online or not.

replies.body:
It's okay, it's added back now.
Thank you funky.

replies.body: :D YAY, I AM FINALLY HAPPY WITH THAT AGAIN!!!

replies.body: You cannot use an abbreviation, it must be the full command.
